programme.title: Face To Face
programme.desc: Wajah yang cantik kelihatan serupa, tetapi jiwa yang menarik sukar dicari walaupun setelah menjelajah jauh. Ramai gadis yang berwajah biasa menggunakan teknologi untuk mengubah diri menjadi wanita yang sangat cantik, namun mereka lupa bahawa rupa paras hanya mampu menarik cinta yang sementara. Cinta yang sejati datang daripada keserasian dan rasa selesa apabila bersama. Kisah ini memberi pengajaran kepada anak muda agar tidak menggunakan teknologi moden untuk menipu diri sendiri. Hanya dengan jujur menerima diri, barulah kita mampu memperoleh cinta yang sebenar.

programme.title: Fi

Demi mendekati Duru, Can sanggup membeli rumah bersebelahan dan menggunakan kepakarannya untuk memanipulasi kehiduan Duru yang ketika itu sedang bahagia bersama teman lelakinya, Deniz. Sementara itu, Ozge, seorang wartawan yang berani, berusaha membongkar sejarah gelap Can

programme.desc: Episod ini akan menerangkan surah al-Kausar. Asbab Al Nuzul yang akan menjelaskan persoalan-persoalan yang menyebabkan turunnya satu-satu ayat atau beberapa ayat untuk menerangkan peristiwa dan hukumnya turunnya ayat Al- Quran. Ia berkaitan dengan beberapa ayat untuk menerangkan hal yang berhubungan dengan peristiwa tertentu atau memberikan jawapan tertentu dalam bahagian dari ilmu tafsir Qur'an.

programme.title: Doa
programme.desc: Episod ini akan membincangkan doa mengenai â€œDoa Mudah Jodohâ€. Doa akan membicarakan mengenai doa-doa yang dapat kita gunakan dalam seharian kita bukan sahaja doa selepas solat tetapi solat yang boleh kita amalkan agar terselamat di dunia dan akhirat.

programme.title: Diari Ustaz
programme.desc: Diari Ustaz merupakan suatu rancangan yang akan mengenengahkan Ustaz tersohor negara didalam menyampaikan tazkirah dan panduan disertai hujah-hujah hadis dan Al Quran. Pengisian menjurus kepada permasalahan semasa masyarakat. Minggu ini Ustaz mengupas tentang topik 'Buli'.

programme.title: Dosa Dalam Islam
programme.desc: Topik yang akan dibincangkan dalam episod kali ini ialah â€œDosa Membazirâ€. Bersama dengan Prof Madya Dato Dr. Izhar Ariff dan ustaz jemputan yang akan mengupas topik ini.

programme.title: Sahabat Sahabat Nabi
programme.desc: Episod ini akan membicarakan mengenai sahabat nabi iaitu An-Nu'man bin Muqarrin Al-Muzanin r.a. Umat Islam yang dikenali sahabat nabi dianggap mempunyai hubungan terus dengan Nabi Muhammad s.a.w dan mereka bukanlah pendusta atau menentang ajaran Islam. Jika meraka melihatnya, mendengarnya, atau berada di hadapan baginda walau sekejap mereka dianggap sebagai sahabat nabi s.a.w.

programme.title: Kisah Dalam Al Quran
programme.desc: Dalam episod kali ini ustaz akan membawakan kisah mengenai "Kisah Nabi Ibrahim dan Namrudâ€. Kisah yang dipaparkan oleh al-Quran adalah sebahagian daripada tanda-tanda mukjizat kerana ia menceritakan mengenai umat terdahulu yang sebahagian besar tidak diketahui.

programme.title: Hidayah Klip
programme.desc: Hidayah Klip adalah sebuah rancangan majalah yang memaparkan penulisan lirik dalam sesebuah lagu bertemakan ketuhanan serta menyeru kearah keagamaan. Penulis lirik mencari bait-bait lirik untuk dijadikan sebuah lagu yang menyentuh hati. Episod kali ini bersama artis jemputan Najwa Latiff yang akan menemani Fakhrul Radhi dalam Hidayah Klip

programme.title: Selamat Datang Cinta
programme.desc: Ariana minta maaf pada Hakim dan mengaku secara terus terang bahawa dia sangat rindukan Hakim. Ini membuatkan hati Hakim cair dan cinta pun bertaut. Mereka meraikan cinta mereka dengan memanjat gunung dan berhenti di tempat yang sama mereka lewati sebelum ini. Dan kali ini, mereka tidak pergi berdua. Malah dengan Yasmin dan Rayyan, yang juga mahu mengabadikan kenangan di sana.

programme.title: Jodoh Kanan Kiri Kanan
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang Ustaz yang terkenal bernama Rizal pulang ke kampungnya untuk berehat seketika. Setibanya dia di Kampung, penduduk kampung sangat mengalu-alukan beliau kerana dek populariti dan ketampanan serta kebijaksanaan beliau. Gadis-gadis tarpesona dengan ketampanan beliau dan mula memenuhi aktiviti yang dijalankan Ustaz Rizal. Saksikan kisah lucu mereka.

programme.title: Puji Pujian & Kalam Allah V2

programme.title: Menantu Tok Sintok
programme.desc: Sejak belajar mengaji dengan Tok Sintok dan berjaya menghafal pelbagai surah pendek, Azhan dan Badrul sedikit sebanyak mula berubah. Mereka sudah rajin solat dan mula bangun solat Subuh walaupun selama ini tak pernah solat Subuh. Mereka tetap bekerja sebagai samseng tarik kereta. Tetapi, mereka rasa bersalah menjadi samseng dan terasa tak selesa. Mereka terpaksa juga kerja untuk teruskan kehidupan dan berhasrat cari kerja lain. Mereka senyap-senyap interview kerja lain tapi gaji pula kecil.

programme.title: Jejak Rasul - Sutera Laut Bicara Syahadah

programme.desc: Dua hari selepas berkahwin, Hatta beritahu keluarganya yang dia dan Leyla akan pindah keluar. Ini membuatkan Puan Sri kecil hati dan Dahlia tuduh Leyla yang menyucuk Hatta. Pada masa yang sama, Zafran pula mempersendakan Leyla yang dikatanya sebagai perempuan bodoh.

programme.title: Pengantin 3 Hari
programme.desc: Tamat sahaja belajar di universiti, Maya buat keputusan untuk membantu emaknya ubah nasib keluarga. Maya akhirnya setuju untuk bekerja dengan Zura setelah dipujuk beberapa kali. Pada hari pertama, Maya mula pelik apabila dia dibawa menyelusuri sebuah lorong untuk pergi ke tempat kerja Zura. Rupa-rupanya Maya diperdaya Zura. Zura hidup mewah dengan pekerjaan yang tak bermaruah sebagai ibu ayam kepada gadis-gadis polos seperti Maya. Perkenalan singkat Maya dan Ikram membawa mereka ke jinjang pelamin. Selepas tiga hari bergelar isteri, Maya diceraikan. Hanya air mata yang membasahi pipi.

programme.desc: Sebuah kisah menyentuh hati tentang pelajar-pelajar dari latar belakang budaya dan agama yang berbeza menyertai pertandingan bakat di sekolah. Dalam perjalanan mereka mengejar impian, mereka berdepan isu keluarga, cinta, kehilangan dan penerimaan. Filem terakhir arahan Yasmin Ahmad ini menampilkan muzik dan mesej perpaduan yang kuat.

programme.title: Pembancuh Kopi Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Nuzul menerima lamaran Irsyad. Walaupun dia berdebar-debar dengan lamaran Irsyad namun hatinya tenang. Dia tahu dia sudah jatuh cinta dengan Irsyad. Melati dan Datin Maizah mahu pitam dengan drama yang terjadi depan mata mereka. Datin Rosalind menceritakan semuanya pada Puan Sri Ayuni tentang Nuzul. Pada mulanya Puan Sri Ayuni tidak termakan dengan kata-kata Datin Rosalind namun apabila soal keturunan dan zuriat dipersoalkan, Puan Sri Ayuni mula bimbang. Dia mahu keturunannya sihat dan normal sedangkan Nuzul mempunyai adik yang tidak normal. Puan Sri Ayuni tidak boleh membiarkan keturunannya bermasalah kerana zuriat Irsyad akan menjadi pewaris utama keluarga mereka.

programme.desc: Akram akhirnya mengakui perasaannya terhadap Baby, tetapi mereka masih perlu menghadapi halangan dari keluarga dan rakan sekerja.

programme.title: Dear Hyeri
programme.desc: Kisah silam terbongkar, Hye-ri ialah nama adik Eun-ho yang telah meninggal dunia. Eun-ho secara tidak sedar mencipta personaliti adiknya demi menebus rasa bersalah. Dia cuba melepaskan masa lalu dan memutuskan untuk berpisah dengan Hyun-oh.

programme.title: Lelaki Melayu Terakhir
programme.desc: Qasih dapati teman lelakinya Edy sedang bersembang mesra dengan kawan baiknya Diana. Jazlan mengajak keluarganya makan malam di sebuah restoran dan idea tersebut dipanjangkan Alawiyah kepada Khatijah untuk membawa Qasih makan bersama mereka. Apabila soalan diajukan kepada anak-anak mereka, Jazlan dan Qasih tidak mempunyai perasaan antara satu sama lain dan ianya amat merisaukan Alawiyah dan Khatijah.

programme.title: Aroma Masak
programme.desc: Mimi Ernida selaku hos musim ini akan menyediakan 3 menu istimewa iaitu nasi goreng udang kering, ayam ABC dan bubur chacha.sambil ditemani oleh selebriti Kael.

programme.title: Bakar
programme.desc: Untuk episode kali ini, Chef Kim akan berkongsi dengan penonton, cara menyediakan Seafood Lasagne & Kek Buah Pic.

programme.title: Bro, Nampak Motor Gua?
programme.desc: Epol membeli motosikal baru menggunakan simpanannya, kemudian membawanya untuk ditunjuk-tunjuk. Malangnya, motosikal itu dicuri oleh dua pencuri. Semasa mencari motornya, Epol bertembung dengan Azura yang beg tangannya turut diragut oleh kumpulan yang sama. Dipecah dalam beg Azura ialah thumb drive yang mengandungi maklumat penting milik Tan Sri Bakhtiar, seorang ahli perniagaan ternama.

programme.title: Pembancuh Kopi Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Nuzul menerima lamaran Irsyad. Walaupun dia berdebar-debar dengan lamaran Irsyad namun hatinya tenang. Dia tahu dia sudah jatuh cinta dengan Irsyad. Melati dan Datin Maizah mahu pitam dengan drama yang terjadi depan mata mereka. Datin Rosalind menceritakan semuanya pada Puan Sri Ayuni tentang Nuzul. Pada mulanya Puan Sri Ayuni tidak termakan dengan kata-kata Datin Rosalind namun apabila soal keturunan dan zuriat dipersoalkan, Puan Sri Ayuni mula bimbang. Dia mahu keturunannya sihat dan normal sedangkan Nuzul mempunyai adik yang tidak normal. Puan Sri Ayuni tidak boleh membiarkan keturunannya bermasalah kerana zuriat Irsyad akan menjadi pewaris utama keluarga mereka.

programme.title: Lelaki Melayu Terakhir

programme.desc: Hyun-oh mendedahkan tanggungjawab besar terhadap keluarganya yang membuatkan dia takut untuk berkomitmen dalam hubungan. Eun-ho pula semakin memahami makna cinta dan pengorbanan.

programme.title: Lelaki Melayu Terakhir
programme.desc: Jazlee memaklumkan kepada ibu dan abangnya yang dia berkenan dengan Fatimah, anak Puan Habsah. Di hari Jazlan nak berangkat ke Madinah, Khatijah datang bersama Qasih untuk sama-sama menghantar beliau di Lapangan Terbang, termasuk juga Fatimah dan kakaknya Aishah tetapi malangnya Aisha tidak sempat untuk menyerahkan hadiah yang dibeli untuk Jazlan.

programme.title: Baby Tak Gila
programme.desc: Cinta Baby dan Akram diuji apabila mereka menghadapi cabaran besar yang mengancam hubungan mereka.

programme.title: Mr Delicious
programme.desc: Rahsia perasaan yang disimpan selama ini terdedah, dan hati yang saling cinta mula bertembung. Persahabatan diuji buat pertama kali.

programme.title: Bro, Nampak Motor Gua?
programme.desc: Epol membeli motosikal baru menggunakan simpanannya, kemudian membawanya untuk ditunjuk-tunjuk. Malangnya, motosikal itu dicuri oleh dua pencuri. Semasa mencari motornya, Epol bertembung dengan Azura yang beg tangannya turut diragut oleh kumpulan yang sama. Dipecah dalam beg Azura ialah thumb drive yang mengandungi maklumat penting milik Tan Sri Bakhtiar, seorang ahli perniagaan ternama.

programme.title: Pembancuh Kopi Mr Vampire
programme.desc: Irsyad semakin merasai apa itu kebahagiaan sejak dia mengikat Nuzul sebagai tunangannya. Setiap hari-harinya mula terisi dengan kehadiran Nuzul dan adik-adiknya. Sesekali Irsyad akan membawa Nuzul dan adik-adiknya keluar beriadah dan akan membawa Irham bersama. Buat pertama kalinya Irsyad merasakan bagaimana mencintai seseorang dan dengan mencintai Nuzul mengajarnya untuk mencintai insan-insan dalam hidup Nuzul. Irsyad sangat teruja untuk menjadikan Nuzul miliknya yang kekal. Setiap hari dia menghitung hari untuk membahagiakan Nuzul. Rasa cintanya pada Nuzul sangat dalam dan hanya Nuzul yang kekal berada di hatinya. Akhirnya, Puan Sri Ayuni mengambil keputusan untuk menyelamatkan maruah keluarga dengan pergi bertemu dengan Nuzul. Dia meminta Nuzul meninggalkan Irsyad dengan baik. Nuzul tergamam.

programme.title: DAPUR BUJANG WESTERN
programme.desc: Rancangan ini memaparkan Chef Naem yang akan berkongsi menu masakan yang mudah dan enak. Dalam episod kali ini, Chef akan menyediakan Ayam Serai & Kari Thai.

programme.title: Fly By Night
programme.desc: Seorang pemandu teksi menggunakan perkhidmatannya sebagai penyamaran untuk kegiatan pemerasan, dan apabila tingkah laku adiknya yang impulsif menarik perhatian polis dan kumpulan samseng ke ambang pintu mereka, dia sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi melindungi orang-orang yang penting dalam hidupnya.

programme.title: Losmen Melati EP6
programme.desc: Selepas lebih satu abad, Melati akhirnya bertemu semula dengan anaknya, Ari. Ari mula mengingati masa lalunya dan bagaimana dia mati. Melati mendedahkan kebenaran Sigit dan Kusno. Walaupun Melati berharap peluang kedua akan menjadikan dia lelaki yang lebih baik, Watih masih tidak mempercayai Sigit. Dia memberi amaran kepadanya bahawa jika dia bertindak menentang Melati dan keluarganya, dia mempunyai kuasa untuk merobek jiwanya dari tubuh barunya. Sara, seorang detektif polis dari bandar dan rakan keluarga Fadil bimbang tentang dia selepas radionya senyap dan memutuskan untuk menjelajah ke negara itu untuk memastikan dia baik-baik saja. Dengan semua tanda menunjuk kepada Losmen Melati, Sara menuju ke rumah terkutuk itu. Semasa Watih berlepas dari Losmen Melati, dia diserang oleh Kusno. Dia membunuh Watih, membalas dendam pertamanya.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP1
programme.desc: McCall masih menghadapi kesan selepas diculik. Pasukannya perlu bekerjasama untuk menyelamatkan dia dan teruskan perjuangan membantu mangsa lain.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP2
programme.desc: Pasukan bantu seorang anak gadis bomba NYFD apabila bapanya hilang secara tiba-tiba. Vi dan Delilah cuba pulihkan diri selepas kejadian diculik McCall.

programme.title: Tuyul
programme.desc: Daniel dan Mia berpindah ke rumah ibu Mia selepas ibunya meninggal dunia. Selepas membersihkan salah satu bilik, Daniel menemui sebotol yang tersembunyi secara misteri di bawah lantai kayu. Botol kosong itu mungkin merupakan rumah kepada makhluk menakutkan yang berpotensi membahayakan Daniel, Mia dan bayi mereka yang belum lahir.

programme.title: Onrust
programme.desc: Bramanto Putra, seorang pelajar arkeologi, menemui sebuah buku nota purba di Pulau Onrust yang telah tertimbus selama 300 tahun.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP2
programme.desc: Pasukan bantu seorang anak gadis bomba NYFD apabila bapanya hilang secara tiba-tiba. Vi dan Delilah cuba pulihkan diri selepas kejadian diculik McCall.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP11
programme.desc: Dr Flora menegur dan menyalahkan Ritz kerana membenarkan Alia mengambil pil depresi dan pil tidur. Ritz mempertahankan tindakannya atas alasan tidak mahu ingatan Alia kembali pulih. Atas desakan, Ritz menjelaskan peristiwa silam yang menyebabkan bapanya terbunuh dan nyawa Alia terancam.Sementara itu Zack sedih melihat keadaan bapanya yang koma angkara perbuatan datuknya sendiri.Dia bertekad untuk melaporkan perbuatan datuknya selama ini kepada pihak polis. Tengku Fateh, sepupu Zacky, membantu dengan memberi maklumat serta bukti. Mereka sependapat tidak mahu ikut cara bapa-bapa dan datuk mereka menguruskan perniagaan keluarga.Dalam perjalanan pulang Alia diculik oleh sekumpulan lelaki bertopeng. Adam diserang ketika memeriksa kereta Alia yang tersadai disebatang jalan. Ritz yang tidak tahu tentang kejadian resah menunggu kepulangan Alia.

programme.title: Obsesi Dia EP12
programme.desc: Ritz semakin gelisah kerana Alia masih tidak pulang ke rumah. Dalam keadaan panik dia menghubungi Zacky dan secara tidak langsung mendedahkan identiti Alia. Adam yang diserang pengikut Amir diikat dan ditahan dalam sebuah pondok bersama Alia. Pihak polis tiba namun Amir sempat lari dengan mengheret Alia bersamanya. Adam berjaya menjejaki mereka dan menyelamatkan Alia setelah Amir terbunuh dalam pertarungan. Sementara itu, Zacky lega apabila bapanya menunjukkan tanda-tanda pulih. Dalam masa yang sama dia mengesyaki Sophie merancang sesuatu yang buruk. Rafeeq pula tidak dapat mengawal perasaan setelah mengetahui Affiyah masih hidup. Dibertekad untuk membunuh Affiyah dan Ritz.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP2
programme.desc: Pasukan bantu seorang anak gadis bomba NYFD apabila bapanya hilang secara tiba-tiba. Vi dan Delilah cuba pulihkan diri selepas kejadian diculik McCall.

programme.title: Detik 12 Malam EP13
programme.desc: Pengantara Detik 12 Malam iaitu Saiful Azmi Jamsari dengan dibantu oleh krew-krew produksi sebagai pembantu penyiasatan berada di Penjara Ayer Molek, Johor. Kisah misteri dan mistik yang ingin diterokai minggu ini adalah tentang penjara yang telah dibina pada 1882, ditutup pada Ogos 2005. Pengantara menemu bual Encik Azman Jabip seorang bekas warden penjara tersebut berkongsi pengalaman menyeramkan melihat susuk lembaga perempuan sedang mendukung bayi dan tiba-tiba hilang. Along Huzai dan Amir Yusof penjejak paranormal memberitahu pernah ternampak lembaga berpakaian banduan menghampiri mereka semasa melakukan penggambaran. Pengantara bersama krew kemudiannya melakukan penyiasatan di lokasi tersebut selepas 12 malam. Mereka sendiri mengalami situasi yang menakutkan dan mistik saperti diceritakan.

programme.title: Taxi 3
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pencuri yang menggelarkan diri mereka sebagai Geng Santa Claus sedang menimbulkan kekacauan, dan polis tidak dapat mengejarnya. Kapten polis Gilbert terganggu oleh seorang wartawan Cina yang menulis cerita tentang skuadnya, isteri detektif Emilien baru sahaja mengumumkan bahawa dia hamil, dan pemandu teksi Daniel sedang mengalami krisis hubungan. Selepas rentetan kesilapan di mana pencuri mengakali polis berkali-kali dengan wartawan di sana untuk merakam semuanya, Daniel dan teksi supernya masuk.

programme.title: Ganjil
programme.desc: Nabila kehilangan rantai lehernya dalam mimpinya. Apabila Amry mencadangkan mereka mencari rantai di rumah Nabila, dia mendapati kebenaran yang tidak selesa.

programme.title: The Equalizer S3 EP3
programme.desc: Seorang ibu tunggal percaya suaminya yang sudah meninggal cuba membunuhnya dari alam lain. McCall dan pasukan menyiasat dakwaan pelik ini.

programme.title: Detik 12 Malam EP14
programme.desc: Pengantara Detik 12 Malam iaitu Saiful Azmi Jamsari dengan dibantu oleh krew-krew produksi sebagai pembantu penyiasatan berada Bukit Putus, Negeri Sembilan. Mereka akan menyusuri jalan yang sunyi disekitar kawasan berkenaan yang dikatakan menyimpan pelbagai misteri. Pengantara menemu bual Encik Angah Arin seorang penduduk tempatan, diberitahu pernah terjumpa kenderaan tanpa pemandu dan lembaga yang tinggi bermata merah. Zam Xtreme seorang Penjejak Paranormal berkongsi pengalaman, pernah terjumpa sebuah kenderaan membawa lembaga menakutkan. Pengantara bersama krew kemudiannya melakukan penyiasatan dengan berada di lokasi tersebut selepas 12 malam. Pengantara sendiri mengalami kejadian seram apabila nama dipanggil berkali-kali tanpa mengetahui dari mana dan siapa.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP3
programme.desc: Hariz mulai punyai suspek baru iaitu Budi yang sebelum ini hanya baik dan dilihat sebagai peminat setianya. Namun Hariz dapat tahu di rumah Budi ada seorang lelaki tua diikat kaki tangannya. Siapa lelaki ini?

programme.title: Onrust
programme.desc: Bramanto Putra, seorang pelajar arkeologi, menemui sebuah buku nota purba di Pulau Onrust yang telah tertimbus selama 300 tahun.

programme.title: Interchange
programme.desc: Dihantui oleh penglihatan yang suram, jurugambar forensik Adam berundur dari dunia, tinggal di rumah dan mengambil gambar jirannya sehingga dia diseret ke dalam penyiasatan lain oleh kawan baiknya, Detektif Man, yang meminta bantuannya untuk menyelesaikan siri pembunuhan ritual yang mengerikan. Pada masa yang sama, hobi Adam yang kelihatan tidak berbahaya tidak lama kemudian menjadi lebih gelap apabila dia mengintip Iva, seorang wanita muda dari Borneo. Terpesona olehnya, dia tidak lama lagi terjerat dalam rangkaian misteri dan pembunuhannya. Ketika Adam diseret lebih jauh ke dalam dunia puak Iva dan Man menyelidiki penyiasatannya dengan lebih mendalam, mereka menemui mistik bawah tanah bomoh dan makhluk ghaib di bandar itu.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah EP3
programme.desc: Hariz mulai punyai suspek baru iaitu Budi yang sebelum ini hanya baik dan dilihat sebagai peminat setianya. Namun Hariz dapat tahu di rumah Budi ada seorang lelaki tua diikat kaki tangannya. Siapa lelaki ini?

programme.title: Ganjil EP1
programme.desc: Nabila dan Amry bertembung di alam mimpi. Pada mulanya, masing-masing menganggap satu sama lain sebagai produk bawah sedar mereka. Mereka segera menyedari bahawa ini bukan mimpi biasa.

programme.title: Villa Nabila
programme.desc: Filem ini mengisahkan mengenai pengalaman sebenar buruh kasar yang ditugaskan untuk merobohkan banglo Villa Nabila.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Balada
programme.desc: Desa mewarisi sebidang tanah hasil penglibatan arwah ayahnya dalam politik tanah air - namun perlu ditebus tanah tersebut. Tidak mahu tanah itu beralih ke tangan orang lain, Desa perlu mencari wang secukupnya. Desa mula berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk mencari wang dengan bakatnya.

programme.title: Ceritaku Ceritamu
programme.desc: Gadis kampung yang memasang cita-cita tinggi untuk mencari pekerjaan di ibu kota. Berpengetahuan dalam bidang fesyen, dia ingin membina masa depan yang lebih cerah buatnya. Setelah berhijrah, Hasnah/Ana bertemu seorang lelaki dan menjalin hubungan bersamanya - namun dia sudah berkahwin dan mempunyai anak sebaya dengannya.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Langit Petang
programme.desc: Seorang wartawan muda, Hafiz ingin membantu kekasihnya, Ruby. Ruby bergelut untuk mengatasi trauma dan pengalaman buruk dari zaman kecilnya. Hafiz sedang menulis rencana tentang kisah Pak Arif yang memiliki tanah pusaka di kampung. Hashim pula ingin membeli kesemua tanah miliknya dan menggunakan taktik jahat untuk mendapatkannya. Ternyata, Ruby adalah anak saudara kepada Pak Arif.

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Kad Cinta
programme.desc: Effa berhijrah ke ibu kota untuk mencari rezeki yang halal diperangkap masuk ke sindiket pelacuran yang sekelip mata mengubah hidupnya. Amri, seorang mekanik menolong Effa untuk keluar dari sindiket itu namun tragedi berlaku apabila Effa dibunuh dan Amri dijadikan suspek kepada pembunuhan itu. Amri mula mencari jalan untuk membersihkan namanya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Sayang Ibu
programme.desc: Setelah kematian bapa akibat satu kebakaran, kehidupan Tiara dan ibunya menjadi semakin sulit. Mereka berdua kemudiannya menumpang tinggal di sebuah pondok. Tiara mempunyai suara yang merdu dan dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi di sebuah Syarikat rakaman. Ketika berada di kota, Tiara meminta jasa baik teman lelakinya untuk menguruskan hal ehwal ibunya di kampung. Namun, teman lelakinya itu menyalahgunakan wang yang diberikan oleh Tiara untuk ibunya.

programme.title: Jeritan Batinku
programme.desc: Fauziah, seorang anak yatim yang sering didera ibu saudaranya, Ramlah, nekad melarikan diri ke bandar. Tindakannya itu telah membawanya ke Sharif yang bertindak menjadikannya sebagai anak angkat. Namun, kehadiran Fauziah tidak disenangi Mahani. Sikap cemburu Mahani hanya membawa padah kepada dirinya. Selain itu, perasaan serba salah Ramlah menyebabkannya mengalami tekanan jiwa. Mampukah Fauziah mengecapi kebahagiaan?

programme.title: Balada
programme.desc: Desa mewarisi sebidang tanah hasil penglibatan arwah ayahnya dalam politik tanah air - namun perlu ditebus tanah tersebut. Tidak mahu tanah itu beralih ke tangan orang lain, Desa perlu mencari wang secukupnya. Desa mula berhijrah ke Kuala Lumpur untuk mencari wang dengan bakatnya.

programme.title: (L) TVS Pagi
programme.desc: TVS Pagi membawakan perkembangan menyeluruh dari dalam dan luar negara.

programme.title: Ninjao
programme.desc: Sekumpulan remaja/belia mengembara ke seluruh sarawak mencari lokasi pendakian mencabar untuk menguji ketahanan fizikal dan mental mereka.

programme.title: (DL) World News
programme.desc: Delivers timely and in-depth coverage of key global events, focusing on international politics, economics, and societal changes, with a spotlight on the latest developments impacting the world today.

programme.title: Sampai 7 Keturunan
programme.desc: Dalam satu peraduan cabutan bertuah, Aidil telah terpilih untuk memenangi percutian lima hari empat malam di sebuah hotel lima bintang serta wang tunai sebanyak lima ribu ringgit. Namun begitu, disebabkan isterinya Syikin yang sedang hamil, Aidil memutuskan untuk tidak mengambil percutian tersebut. Walaupun begitu, Aidil berasa sayang untuk melepaskan hadiah itu begitu sahaja. Dia memberikan wang tunai dan tiket tersebut kepada Pak Karim, yang pada mulanya keberatan untuk menerimanya kerana bimbang meninggalkan ayam kesayangannya. Setelah dipujuk berkali-kali, Pak Karim akhirnya bersetuju walaupun masih risaukan ayamnya.

programme.title: Reaksiar
programme.desc: Program yang memaparkan perkongsian pengalaman dan reaksi artis-artis jemputan setelah melihat kembali klip-klip lakonan mereka.

programme.title: Oppa
programme.desc: Menggambarkan seorang guru yang terperangkap dalam penipuan percintaan dalam talian, mendedahkan cabaran jenayah siber di Malaysia. Usaha pihak Polis Diraja memburu penjenayah menambah elemen suspen.

programme.title: Kasut Ku Kusut
programme.desc: Kasut Ku Kusut mengisahkan seorang pemuda kampung bernama Manap yang berasa kecewa kerana kasut barunya telah hilang. Sementara itu, Markos, ahli kumpulan gangster Father Dragon, ditugaskan untuk membawa Suzi kepada ketua geng. Dalam perjalanan, mereka tersesat di sebuah kampung, dan Suzi berjaya melarikan diri lalu bertemu dengan Manap yang masih mencari kasutnya. Ketika Markos menemui mereka, Manap menyedari bahawa kasut yang dipakai oleh Markos kelihatan sangat mirip dengan kasutnya yang hilang.

programme.title: Hantu Tok Mudim
programme.desc: Sekumpulan lelaki muda cuba menakutkan penduduk kampung dengan cerita hantu Tok Mudim untuk mengaut keuntungan, tapi akhirnya mereka sendiri terjerat dalam situasi lucu

programme.title: Ruang Temu
programme.desc: Program temu bual bersama Tony Eusoff yang mengupas pengalaman peribadi beliau berkaitan pengalaman beliau di dalam industri seni

programme.title: Dari Hatiku ke Hatimu
programme.desc: Telefilem ini mengisahkan tentang Ayla Yanira, seorang gadis dari Pulau Langkawi yang membenci lelaki, terutama dari Kuala Lumpur, selepas mengalami putus cinta akibat jarak yang jauh. Kisah hidupnya berubah apabila Zaid Hidayat, seorang jejaka dari Kuala Lumpur, muncul dan perlahan-lahan membuka kembali pintu hati Ayla yang lama terkunci.

programme.title: 29 Februari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Budi, seorang lelaki yang dilahirkan pada 29 Februari 1896 dan hanya meningkat usia setiap empat tahun sekali. Sepanjang hayatnya, Budi menyaksikan pelbagai perubahan zaman dan kehilangan insan tersayang, sehinggalah dia bertemu cinta sejatinya, Lily, yang mengubah perjalanan hidupnya.

programme.title: Taikun
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua lelaki bernama Tai dan Kun, sahabat baik yang hanya meminati pergaduhan dan mencuri. Apabila tabiat buruk mereka menyebabkan mereka bertembung dan memukul teruk ahli geng Pink dan Purple, Tai dan Kun kemudian direkrut oleh ketua geng yang kagum dengan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih 2
programme.desc: Lanjutan dari Ketika Cinta Bertasbih yang mengisahkan Azzam kembali ke Indonesia selepas 9 tahun belajar di Kairo. Walaupun sudah bergelar sarjana, dia sukar cari kerja dan dipengaruhi tekanan masyarakat. Sambil menambah pengalaman berniaga, Azzam juga berdepan konflik cinta apabila wanita yang dicintainya telah dipinang sahabatnya, sementara Eliana yang menyukainya sendiri belum dapat diterimanya sebagai pilihan hati.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih
programme.desc: Cerita tentang Azzam, seorang pemuda yang berpegang teguh pada nilai-nilai Islam, berusaha menuntut ilmu sambil mengekalkan cinta kepada Tsuraya. Mereka menghadapi pelbagai ujian, konflik keluarga, dan rintangan sosial, namun keyakinan dan keimanan membimbing mereka menempuh cabaran cinta dan kehidupan.

programme.title: Ketika Cinta Bertasbih 2
programme.desc: Lanjutan dari Ketika Cinta Bertasbih yang mengisahkan Azzam kembali ke Indonesia selepas 9 tahun belajar di Kairo. Walaupun sudah bergelar sarjana, dia sukar cari kerja dan dipengaruhi tekanan masyarakat. Sambil menambah pengalaman berniaga, Azzam juga berdepan konflik cinta apabila wanita yang dicintainya telah dipinang sahabatnya, sementara Eliana yang menyukainya sendiri belum dapat diterimanya sebagai pilihan hati.

programme.title: Fat Buddies
programme.desc: Seorang bekas agen rahsia â€œJâ€ yang cedera dan menjadi obes selepas misi, masih bertekad menjalankan tugas penting. Dalam perjalanannya ke Jepun untuk mendapatkan dokumen sulit, dia bertemu seorang pengawal keselamatan besar badan, Hao Yingjun. Mereka tak dijangka bekerjasama dalam satu misi komedi berbahaya melibatkan sindiket dadah, penuh aksi lucu, cabaran pelik dan situasi goofy sepanjang pengembaraan mereka.

programme.title: The Swords Woman
programme.desc: Di era Dinasti Ming, anak perempuan seorang pegawai tinggi menjadi buruan selepas keluarganya diburu akibat politik istana. Semasa melarikan diri, dia bertemu seorang sarjana dan bersama mereka mempertahankan diri daripada musuh sambil mencari kebebasan dan keadilan. Filem ini terkenal dengan aksi pedang klasik wuxia dan adegan seni mempertahankan diri yang berpengaruh dalam sejarah filem Asia.

programme.title: Jejak Cahaya Islam Banjarmasin
programme.desc: Jejak sejarah Islam yang mendalam melalui keindahan alam semula jadi yang menakjubkan dan masjid-masjid megah di Banjarmasin dalam dokumentari yang menarik.

programme.title: My Heart
programme.desc: Raisa yang patah hati selepas tunangnya, Rio, hilang tiba-tiba, pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari jawapan. Di sana, dia bertemu Mike, seorang pelakon drama popular yang sebenarnya berperwatakan sensitif dan bermasalah, berbeza dengan wataknya di kaca TV. Perkenalan mereka secara kebetulan menjadi semakin rapat apabila mereka mula mengenali diri sebenar masing-masing. Namun, cinta mereka diuji apabila terbongkar bahawa ibu Mike, Rika, adalah isteri kedua kepada ayah Raisa, menyebabkan perebutan harta antara keluarga mereka.

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Hidayah Cinta
programme.desc: Gia dianggap pembawa malang sejak lahir dan dijodohkan dengan Aslam yang terkena kutukan Mata Jahat. Masalah demi masalah berlaku selepas perkahwinan mereka. Aslam tidak mencintai Gia kerana hatinya hanya untuk Rati, bekas tunangan yang sangat disayanginya.

programme.title: Cinta Di Ujung Sajadah
programme.desc: Rindu dan Fauzan terpaksa berdepan dengan kenyataan pahit apabila penipuan masa lalu Rindu terbongkar. Fauzan yang marah mengusir Rindu keluar dari rumah, dan Rindu berjuang untuk mendapatkan hak penjagaan anak mereka, Ayu. Dalam penyesalan, Fauzan mula menyedari bahawa cintanya terhadap Rindu masih belum padam. Namun, segalanya menjadi rumit apabila Fauzan berkahwin dengan wanita lain bernama Alia. Di sisi lain, Rindu berkenalan dengan Hafiz yang benar-benar menyayanginya.

programme.title: Mulianya Ramadan
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan hiburan berunsur keagamaan untuk memeriahkan malam Ramadan anda, dengan muzik yang memberi semangat, dakwah yang penuh inspirasi, dan hiburan yang menyentuh hati.

programme.title: Jejak Cahaya Islam Banjarmasin
programme.desc: Jejak sejarah Islam yang mendalam melalui keindahan alam semula jadi yang menakjubkan dan masjid-masjid megah di Banjarmasin dalam dokumentari yang menarik.

programme.title: Kata Ustadz Solmed
programme.desc: Kata Ustadz Solmed merupakan program bual bicara yang dibimbing oleh pengacara dan ustaz terkenal yang akan fokus membincangkan tentang masalah yang sering dialami oleh masyarakat sehinggalah masalah rumah tangga dari sudut agama.

programme.title: Konser Luar Biasa Vol. 2 - Forever Dangdut
programme.desc: Konser Luar Biasa Vol. 2 - Forever Dangdut meraikan peminat dangdut dengan menampilkan barisan bintang hebat dan persembahan luar biasa. Penuh dengan kemeriahan dan nostalgia, acara ini membawa hiburan yang tak terlupakan.

programme.title: D'Academy 7
programme.desc: D' Academy 7 ialah musim ketujuh rancangan nyanyian popular Indonesia yang fokus pada muzik dangdut. Peserta dari seluruh negara bertanding dengan menyanyikan lagu dangdut, menunjukkan bakat vokal dan persembahan mereka. Sepanjang musim, mereka dinilai oleh juri profesional dan undian penonton. Siapakah yang akan menjuarai D'Academy musim ketujuh?

programme.desc: Arman dan Susi baru sahaja kehilangan anak pertama mereka yang baru lahir. Susi jatuh ke dalam kemurungan yang mendalam, hingga kehilangan kewarasan. Anita datang untuk bekerja sebagai pembantu rumah tangga yang merawat Susi. Namun, tanpa pengetahuan sesiapa, Anita mula menaruh perasaan terhadap Arman.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: THE ASSASSIN
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed people are desperate for help and the killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: LOVE 911
programme.desc: A doctor tries to woo a grieving, widowed firefighter in her attempt to get him to testify on her behalf in a medical malpractice case.

programme.title: HEAR ME: OUR SUMMER
programme.desc: Yong-jun is working as a delivery man when he meets and instantly falls for Yeo-reum, the devoted sister of a gifted deaf swimmer. Yeo-reum slowly opens her heart to warm-hearted Yong-jun.

programme.title: A MELODY TO REMEMBER
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-Ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: LOVE RESET
programme.desc: A couple decide to divorce after two years of marriage. They revive a 30-day divorce settlement period from the court, but then they both lost memories after a car accident...

programme.title: THE ROUNDUP: NO WAY OUT
programme.desc: There is a drug case links to an organized crime organization in Japan. Despite the expanding scale of the case, the beast cop and his team strive their best to arrest the criminal...

programme.title: DECIBEL
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left behind to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: THE EXCLUSIVE: BEAT THE DEVIL'S TATTOO
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: HONEST CANDIDATE 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: PENINSULA
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: THE MAN FROM NOWHERE
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: MIRACLE IN CELL NO.7
programme.desc: A mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl reunites with his young daughter in prison.

programme.title: THE BAD GUYS: REIGN OF CHAOS
programme.desc: Oh Gu-Tak, the Chief of 'Special Crime Unit' join hands with a former gangster, a con artist and a convicted cop to solve cases. They begin to hunt for the bad guys hidden...

programme.title: Fresh off the Sea
programme.desc: Yum Jung-ah, Ahn Eun-jin, Park Jun-myun, Dex and special guests are visiting seaside villages in Korea. They will live there and cook fresh seasonal dishes using ingredients from the sea.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea's passion for heat to a global stageâ€”mixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Reply 1988 10th Anniversary
programme.desc: To celebrate the 10th anniversary of drama 'Reply 1988', the beloved cast reunited for a group MT to revisit memories.

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber's license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: Dear X follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: Golden Bowl
programme.desc: Man's Noodles is passed down to the current generation. Man Shui (Raymond Cho), Man Nin (Hugo Wong) and Man Sai (Mark Ma) have learned the craft from their father and opened their own noodle shops. However, three shops on the same street have resulted in destructive competition. Lung Kau (Mayanne Mak), Fok Siu-yuk (Ashley Chu) and Kam Chi (Kamen Kong) are their wives respectively. They often quarrel as they earnestly defend their husbands. The siblings' mother Madam Man Ji Chin-hung (Nancy Sit) has not intervened in the feud between her three sons as she is faced with a dilemma. Just before CNY's Eve, Chin-hung sees her late husband in her dream. He brings up the topic of sibling rivalry and tells Chin-hung to restore things to order. Chin-hung then uses the legend of the Mans' Golden Bowl, which was bestowed by the Emperor, as an excuse for luring her three sons into temporarily staying at their old home from first to seventh of January. Chin-hung pretends to observe her sons and their family members' behavior which she uses as a basis for deciding who is the Golden Bowl winner. In fact, she hopes to unite everybody through participation by the three families in traditional CNY activities.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: Web media editor Ho Ka-yan (Elaine Yiu) encounters track and field coach Yuen Nik (Joel Chan) as she is assigned the task of approaching the Windchasers Club and digging up scandalous dirt. Because of some past regrettable incident, Yuen Nik avoids socializing with other people. But he is getting closer and closer to Ka-yan as he repeatedly mingles with her. Kwok Bui-yee (Tiffany Lau), daughter of tycoon Kwok Wong-po (Ram Chiang), eagerly joins Windchasers as she has some ulterior motive. However, Wong-po and Yuen Nik keep agitating each other as Wong-po becomes Windchasers' sponsor. Yuen Nik's buddy Lai Shun-fan (Max Cheung) asks Yuen Nik to look after his young son Mak Yu-sun. The duo gradually develop an amicable mentor-disciple relationship. And Shun-fan and Ka-yan actually had some emotional issues. Shun-fan then becomes self-destructive due to some serious illness. Yuen Nik is determined to make him pick himself up. Meanwhile, Yuen Nik takes a good look at himself as he wants to again set foot on the runway.

programme.title: STEP INTO THE PAST, A
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is an secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He was born a romantic man, and even though he is in a totally different time and space, he still manages to get into a love rectangle with a princess, an intellectual and a tycoon's daughter.

programme.title: Law dis-Order
programme.desc: As the founder of the leading Chinese law firm, CHEUK KAI-YIU (Lau Dan) has been re-elected as chairman of the committee for many terms. Though he promised managing partner LAU KING-CHANG (Liu Kai Chi) that he would step down, he deliberately brings in a materialistic lawyer called CHEUNG KEUNG (Alex Fong) to counterbalance KING-CHANG's obsession with power. For years, KING-CHANG has built up significant influence in the company and his associates include YAM WAI-LEUNG (Raymond Cho) and FONG NING (Mandy Wong). Thinking he could easily handle his opponent CHEUNG KEUNG's allies namely LEE SIU-WAH (Florence Kwok) and CHOW LIK-HANG (Matthew Ho), a traffic accident catches him off guard. Taking advantage of the situation, CHEUNG KEUNG gets himself a lucrative offer from KAI-YIU to become a senior partner, and even re-encounters lawyer CHEUK YI-CHUN (Ali Lee) in the process. YI-CHUN, who has a special position in the company, initially looks down on CHEUNG KEUNG but later grows fond of him. The two form a peer mentoring relationship, forcing KING-CHANG, the power-obsessed "time bomb", to finally fess up. With the descent into infighting of the whole firm, a toothless tiger that has managed to stay under the radar for years is seeking revenge......

programme.title: Law dis-Order

programme.title: Happy Ever After
programme.desc: TUNG KOON (AU YEUNG CHUN WAH, BOBBY) born with a special 'King's Tongue' is betrayed by his assistant, SIU SIU (CHAN MIU YING, MARIANE) who had prepared some chili source without permission. TUNG is accused of deceiving the Emperor and is forced to flee from Guangzhou to the capital. When SIU discovered that someone had used her to trap TUNG, she sees TUNG in person and apologizes. TUNG and SIU eventually reconcile. Love feeling blossoms between them. They join together to cook a very delicious 'Marinated Lung Slice'. The Emperor, KIN LUNG (KWONG WA) loves it very much and offer TUNG to work in the palace kitchen. Since then TUNG becomes one of the Emperor's favourite officials. TUNG's good friend, MIN LEUNG (KWOK CHUN ON) gains an official title with his wife, TSUI FA (LEUNG NGAI LING, FIONA)'s support. However, LEUNG abandons FA because of the reunion with his old lover, SIN YUNG (CHEONG WAI YEE, ANGIE). In order not to ruin LEUNG's reputation, FA tolerates. Unexpectedly, YUNG accepts bribes secretly on behalf of LEUNG. YUNG's act ruins LEUNG's futureâ€¦.

programme.title: Golden Bowl
programme.desc: Man's Noodles is passed down to the current generation. Man Shui (Raymond Cho), Man Nin (Hugo Wong) and Man Sai (Mark Ma) have learned the craft from their father and opened their own noodle shops. However, three shops on the same street have resulted in destructive competition. Lung Kau (Mayanne Mak), Fok Siu-yuk (Ashley Chu) and Kam Chi (Kamen Kong) are their wives respectively. They often quarrel as they earnestly defend their husbands. The siblings' mother Madam Man Ji Chin-hung (Nancy Sit) has not intervened in the feud between her three sons as she is faced with a dilemma. Just before CNY's Eve, Chin-hung sees her late husband in her dream. He brings up the topic of sibling rivalry and tells Chin-hung to restore things to order. Chin-hung then uses the legend of the Mans' Golden Bowl, which was bestowed by the Emperor, as an excuse for luring her three sons into temporarily staying at their old home from first to seventh of January. Chin-hung pretends to observe her sons and their family members' behavior which she uses as a basis for deciding who is the Golden Bowl winner. In fact, she hopes to unite everybody through participation by the three families in traditional CNY activities.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: Web media editor Ho Ka-yan (Elaine Yiu) encounters track and field coach Yuen Nik (Joel Chan) as she is assigned the task of approaching the Windchasers Club and digging up scandalous dirt. Because of some past regrettable incident, Yuen Nik avoids socializing with other people. But he is getting closer and closer to Ka-yan as he repeatedly mingles with her. Kwok Bui-yee (Tiffany Lau), daughter of tycoon Kwok Wong-po (Ram Chiang), eagerly joins Windchasers as she has some ulterior motive. However, Wong-po and Yuen Nik keep agitating each other as Wong-po becomes Windchasers' sponsor. Yuen Nik's buddy Lai Shun-fan (Max Cheung) asks Yuen Nik to look after his young son Mak Yu-sun. The duo gradually develop an amicable mentor-disciple relationship. And Shun-fan and Ka-yan actually had some emotional issues. Shun-fan then becomes self-destructive due to some serious illness. Yuen Nik is determined to make him pick himself up. Meanwhile, Yuen Nik takes a good look at himself as he wants to again set foot on the runway.

programme.title: STEP INTO THE PAST, A
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is an secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He was born a romantic man, and even though he is in a totally different time and space, he still manages to get into a love rectangle with a princess, an intellectual and a tycoon's daughter.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong and Global View
programme.desc: Report important news about Hong Kong, cross-strait, and international affairs.

programme.title: Who Wants A Baby?
programme.desc: An unexpected pregnancy catches couple TONG TIM-YEE (Ali Lee) and IP CHI-TING (Lai Lok Yi) off guard. They depend on their mothers for baby-sitting, but conflict ensues when the in-laws' parenting skills are poles apart. The emotionally wrought and physically challenging experience of caring for their baby girl 24/7 leaves them no other choice but to hire an experienced confinement nanny, WONG KAI-MIU (Griselda Yeung), to help them. The arrival of her newborn forces TIM-YEE to give up her fashion career; whereas CHI-TING has to say goodbye to his relaxing and enjoyable nightlife. In order to spend more time to look after her daughter, TIM-YEE changes her career to take over a post-natal care agency. With KAI-MIU pulling a few strings, TIM-YEE gets to know many expectant couples and nannies. In her role as a new mom, she is struck with a newfound appreciation, but feels like she and her husband CHI-TING are growing apart. On top of that, she even suspects that he has an affair with his coworker bartender HUI CHING (Samantha Ko). Surprisingly, CHI-TING captivates the internet after bravely saving a child in an accident, and is dubbed the â€œgreatest dadâ€ ever, which makes the agency a childcare KOL, turning things upside downâ€¦â€¦

programme.title: More Fun In Macau
programme.desc: More Fun In Macau

programme.title: Hands Up 2026
programme.desc: The brand-new children's program â€œHands Upâ€ encourages kids to ask questions bravely, express themselves, and pursue their goals! Members of the mascot â€œSauce Familyâ€ join the hosts in performing short skits, accompanying everyone for joyful moments. The show will also feature a variety of children's songs, allowing kids to sing along while learning practical life knowledge.

programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune & What's On Today
programme.desc: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune & What's On Today

programme.title: Not Far From Here
programme.desc: Even with limited vacation time, you can still embark on a trip to explore the Greater Bay Area, thanks to "Not Far From Here"!C Kwan,Billy Luk and Karen Wu team up to uncover travel information, savoring modern Cantonese cuisine, top-notch vegetarian dishes, exquisite French food, and the delightful Omakase dessert. A sensory feast of exotic insects awaits. Immerse yourself in a jazz whiskey bar, enjoying vinyl music and stand-up comedy performances. Leisure and entertainment abound, including luxurious massage treatments, a five-star buffet, and a variety of recreational facilities. What's it like to experience a storm-themed spa? Dress up and enjoy an escape room adventure - thrilling enough! The team will also visit trendy areas and Western antique museums to find their favorite items.

programme.title: The Unusual Prosecutor
programme.desc: Department of Justice SADPP Pau Hey-yan (Joe Ma) possesses extreme empathy as he suffers from a rare condition called â€œmirror-touch synesthesiaâ€. His aim is to piece together the complete truth in a case, strive to get the defendant to plead guilty, and minimize the sufferings of the victims from tedious hearings. Hey-yan teams up with law clerk Kung Suen Pak (Winki Lai), like-minded Senior Inspector Chin Hung-fei (Ricco Ng), former victim Chun Sheung-yin (Hera Chan) and trainee prosecutor Chiu Zhi-ching (Aska Cheung) to uphold justice. The chums run into obstacles. And Hey-yan has to turn hostile against his mother, who is the eldest daughter of a conglomerate, and confront his ex-lover Wong Chung-sing (Alice Chan), who is a barrister by profession. However, Hey-yan adheres to his beliefs as he is determined to uncover the truth and seek justice for the victims!

programme.title: Scoop 2026
programme.desc: "Scoop" airs from Monday to Sunday, closely following major social events and interesting stories, while also reporting the latest updates in the entertainment industry, celebrity news, as well as drama promotions and behind-the-scenes features. The "Today's Breaking News" segment keeps viewers up to date with the day's hottest stories. programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: " Big Boys Club" is a youth talk show hosted by a group of close friendsâ€”Bob Lam, Oscar Leung, Derek Wong, Philip Fan, and Alan Chan. In each episode, singers, entertainers, or guests from various fields are invited for relaxed interviews, presenting a wide range of topics including current social issues, pop culture, and trending interests. Matters of love, relationships, and even same-sex relationships are endlessly discussed topics for men and women alike. programme.title: Hands Up 2026
programme.desc: The brand-new children's program â€œHands Upâ€ encourages kids to ask questions bravely, express themselves, and pursue their goals! Members of the mascot â€œSauce Familyâ€ join the hosts in performing short skits, accompanying everyone for joyful moments. programme.title: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune
programme.desc: 2026 Feng Shui and Fortune

programme.title: Yummy, Yummy? Yummy! & What's On Today
programme.desc: While filming a historical food video, Shen Yaoguang's family accidentally enters a dream world and lands in ancient Yong'an. To survive, they open a small eatery serving modern style dishes, becoming unexpectedly popular. Mistaking Prefect Lin Yan for an ancestor, they move into his residence under a fake engagement and form a deep bond. Using modern knowledge, the family adapts to ancient life and helps Lin Yan uncover the truth behind his family's injustice, exposing Prince Wu's conspiracy. Together they protect the city, and after a life or death trial, they awaken back in reality with renewed understanding of family and heritage.

programme.title: Forbidden City Cop
programme.desc: The emperor had a secret imperial guard of four men, known as the "Dragon Protectors," whose duties were passed down through generations. Their sole responsibility was to protect the emperor and all the palace's properties. The four guards were: Ling Ling Gong, who was invulnerable to swords and spears; Ling Ling Xi, whose leg strength was like breaking stones; Ling Ling Cai, whose fists were like tigers and five-element fists; and Ling Ling Fa, who knew nothing about martial arts but was good at inventing. Ah Fa was obsessed with inventing and often used his ingenuity to create many novel objects. However, the emperor did not think these were his specialties because ingenuity was not enough to protect him. Therefore, he often scolded Ah Fa for not making progress and not practicing martial arts. Because of this, the emperor did not keep Ah Fa in the palace all the time, but instead had him work outside as a gynecologist to cover up his actions and serve his orders.

programme.title: Shining Just for You
programme.desc: The fantasy period drama "Shining Just for You" tells the story of Ye Ling Shuang (played by Peng Xiaoran), a grassland girl who is considered a jinx by her tribe because she can foresee disasters. Only Princess Qi Hai Rui (played by Liu Mengrui) of Ye Bei treats her like a sister. Ye Bei, overestimating its strength, launches a war against the Chao Kingdom, suffering a crushing defeat and losing many soldiers. Ye Ling Shuang is taken prisoner and sent to a brothel, but she refuses to submit. Using her talent for astrology, she enters the Imperial Observatory and gradually wins the heart of the ruthless emperor Yu Xiu Ming (played by Feng Shaofeng). However, just as their friendship deepens, Ye Ling Shuang learns of Qi Hai Rui's death and breaks ties with Yu Xiu Ming. Determined to save Qi Hai Rui, Ye Ling Shuang reverses time and returns to the Ye Bei of the past. Can she change what has already happened? And what will become of her relationship with Yu Xiu Ming?

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Jade Channel reports important local, cross-strait, and international news every afternoon at 6:30.

programme.title: Shock Mystery (Sr.2) & What's On Today
programme.desc: Human beings are innately curious about the unknown. Some even believe that not everything in life can be explained solely by scientific or physical phenomena. Even when there appears to be an acceptable answer on the surface, it may not fully resolve all our questions. The production team of " Shock Mystery" has collected hundreds of strange and unusual cases from around the world, most of which cannot be explained from the perspectives commonly accepted by peopleâ€”unless supernatural phenomena truly exist in our world! This program will introduce you to incredible mysteries that not only existed in the past but still persist today!

programme.title: Maria's Auspicious Menu 9
programme.desc: Maria's Auspicious Menu 9

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: The Unusual Prosecutor
programme.desc: Department of Justice SADPP Pau Hey-yan (Joe Ma) possesses extreme empathy as he suffers from a rare condition called â€œmirror-touch synesthesiaâ€. His aim is to piece together the complete truth in a case, strive to get the defendant to plead guilty, and minimize the sufferings of the victims from tedious hearings. Hey-yan teams up with law clerk Kung Suen Pak (Winki Lai), like-minded Senior Inspector Chin Hung-fei (Ricco Ng), former victim Chun Sheung-yin (Hera Chan) and trainee prosecutor Chiu Zhi-ching (Aska Cheung) to uphold justice. The chums run into obstacles. And Hey-yan has to turn hostile against his mother, who is the eldest daughter of a conglomerate, and confront his ex-lover Wong Chung-sing (Alice Chan), who is a barrister by profession. However, Hey-yan adheres to his beliefs as he is determined to uncover the truth and seek justice for the victims!

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: Many people may think that older adults do not have sexual needs, but surveys have shown that this is not the caseâ€”older adults often experience less sexual activity due to various reasons. Clinical psychologist Lin Haoming from the Social Welfare Department explains the World Health Organization's definition of sexuality and offers advice for those hoping to rekindle their sex life with their partner. However, if one partner does not wish to resume sexual activity, how should both sides communicate?

programme.title: Zhen Di
programme.desc: Set in Guilin (1938-1944), this drama depicts the "Cultural War of Resistance" led by the CPC and the Eighth Route Army Office. programme.title: CNY - Pro on their Speciality
programme.desc: This educational documentary explores business stories across Taiwan. In this episode, it celebrates the Lantern Festival, also known as the Little New Year, featuring the thrilling Yanshui Beehive Fireworks in Tainan, Lantern Festival traditions such as Qigu turtle offerings at a long-established pastry shop in Taipei, and vocational training in correctional facilities that helps individuals rebuild skills, dignity, and hope for reintegration into society.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Taste of Life
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Mr.Player - 11
programme.desc: To mark its anniversary, Mr Player travels to Canada for a special overseas edition. Hosts and celebrity guests team up for large-scale outdoor missions, international challenges, and Taiwanese-themed cooking battles, delivering excitement, laughter, and unforgettable moments of teamwork and adventure.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: CNY - Stylish Man-The Chef
programme.desc: On Little New Years Eve, the entire cast of Stylish Man-The Chef joins viewers to bid farewell to the old year and welcome the new. Featuring fun challenges and festive games, the episode sets out to crown the Stylish Man MVP, who will lead the team to win generous red packet rewards. Filled with laughter and joyful moments, the celebration delivers a full New Year atmosphere. MVP

programme.title: CNY - Blessing of Formosa
programme.desc: In this episode, the hosts travel across Taiwan during the New Year season, visiting temple communities and lively night markets in the north, central, and south. Through local traditions and everyday interactions, the programme captures the festive atmosphere and cultural charm of Taiwans temple night markets.

programme.title: CNY - Stylish Man-The Chef - R&BPKPK
programme.desc: Stylish Man-The Chef blends cooking battles with fun impersonation segments to deliver a unique New Year challenge. With food, games, and endless laughs, this festive special brings plenty of joy and holiday spirit. PK

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Mr.Player - 11
programme.desc: To mark its anniversary, Mr Player travels to Canada for a special overseas edition. Hosts and celebrity guests team up for large-scale outdoor missions, international challenges, and Taiwanese-themed cooking battles, delivering excitement, laughter, and unforgettable moments of teamwork and adventure.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: Out of Order
programme.desc: A successful lawyer's secret affair turns into a nightmare when a corpse unexpectedly turns up in the hotel room, triggering a desperate cover-up that spirals into uncontrollable chaos.

programme.title: Band Four
programme.desc: An aspiring singer of an indie band called Band Four reunites with her estranged guitarist father following the death of her mother. Together with her half-sister and her nine-year-old son, the newly reunited family come together to support each other through their love and passion for music.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mother's chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the family's gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Little Red Sweet
programme.desc: A Chinese dessert shop owned by the Chang family in Kowloon City faces upheaval when the mother suffers a devastating stroke. Their daughter sacrifices her dream of becoming a flight attendant to help keep the family business alive, but tensions rise as she clashes with her father. Can they find a way to overcome their struggles and remain united?

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Successful businesswoman Yu Chu has no chance of finding a husband with her insufferable personality, much to the consternation of her younger brother Yu Bo, who due to a curse, will fail in love until his sister gets married. Yu Bo hires a love expert, Dick, to woo his sister. Smitten at first sight, Yu Chu is not about to let Dick get away...

programme.title: Go for Broke
programme.desc: A ruthless drug trafficking group has destroyed countless families due to drug addiction, including Zhang Yao's family. Vowing to take revenge, Zhang Yao teams up with Detective An to take down the drug lords. As their revenge plot unfolds, do they share a common foe or harbour personal agendas?

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his son's talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: The story is based on a 1993 true event, the "China-Russia Train Robbery" where a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman heads the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy insteadâ€¦

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70's Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sister's magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: Continuing the success of the classic comedy â€œHouse of 72 tenantsâ€, this sequel tells the stories of tenants living in an old building in Hong Kong who are forced to evict by the developers. Some tenants prefer to take the compensation while some resist the move. Will the acquisitions plan destroy the harmony of the neighborhood?

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: Young Long Jian Fei, a martial arts novice, is adopted by the Fire Spirit Demon who taught him the powerful Buddha's Palm, turning Long into a martial arts master. Long is tasked by the Fire Spirit Demon to takes revenge for his master, and this soon unleashes a storm upon the martial arts worldâ€¦

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiao's fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends' help.

programme.title: Village Of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal
programme.desc: Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Family's matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies' leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild
programme.desc: Watch sea lion Lola take her first chaotic steps into a macho battlefield on Argentina's coast. Cheer as this baby learns key vocal and swimming skills, fights to stay by mom Maria's side, and makes a lightning-fast escape from the jaws of death.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: Find surprises in Mexico's untamed Sierra Gorda biosphere. Prowl the arid semi-desert with horned lizards, marvel at axolotl regeneration in the river-fed foothills, and soar with monarch butterflies in the treetops high above a hazy cloud forest.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: Visit the Monteverde cloud forest, where swirling mists feed Costa Rica's mighty rivers and create a haven for biodiversity. See some of its 750 tree species, hang out with sloths and monkeys, and watch nature heal after decades of deforestation.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons

programme.title: Ange And The Boss: Puskas in Australia

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Spain's Toxic Tourism
